dict.acceptation: 朝…看，面对；碰上，使面对参见；提供正面；充当正面；
朝向，面向别的事物；袒护，掩饰；

sent.orig: Dependent front suspensions have a rigid front axle that connects the front wheels.
sent.trans: 整体式前悬挂与前轮车轴采用的是刚性连接。

sent.orig: Campaign by the South-West Front, Stalingrad Front and the implementation of the Don common front.
sent.trans: 战役由西南方面军、斯大林格勒方面军和顿河方面军共同实施。

sent.orig: To force (air) upward from Earth's surface, as when front overtakes and undercuts warm front.
sent.trans: 使（气旋等）锢囚迫使（空气）从地球表面上升，如在冷锋压过并削弱暖锋时。

sent.orig: The front sledge could be steered by a lever on the front of the frame.
sent.trans: 前滑板可由位于机身前部的操纵杆控制。

sent.orig: Yangtze River back wave pushes front wave, front wave dies on the beach.
sent.trans: 长江后浪推前浪，前浪死在沙滩上。死在沙滩上的就是保守思想者。
